channel.title: DaVinci Resolve-notes on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in DaVinci Resolve-notes on Petfactory

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Python
item.description: An old scripting guide can be found here Python & Lua Historically FusionScript was Lua only, some methods that return multiple statements have a special Table() suffix variant to return the proper table for use in Python. As the Lua collection is a tuple, you will need to pass a dictionary to the API in many cases, even when it seems to be treated like a list. So each Value needs to have a key in the order of the entry.

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Fusion
item.description: Create a fusion comp Timeline to fusion To “send” a clip from the edit page to the fusion page we set the playhead on the clip and switch over to the fusion page, This will give use 2 nodes the media in and media out New Composition We can also create a new Fusion composition. Open up the media pool, RMB click in the content section of a bin and choose “New Fusion Composition”.

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Edit
item.description: Quick tips Keyboard Customization DaVinci Resolve > Keyboard Customization Project settings Shift 9 click the home icon in the lower right corner of the main ui File > Project Settings Projects Manager Shift 1 click the cog icon in the lower right corner of the main ui File > Project Manager Reset UI Workspace > Reset UI Layout
